title: Bug 124620: Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in library is deleted
OB: When the report design file is reopened after the parameter in the library is deleted, the icon of the parameter appears unchanged. However, if similar operations are performed on a dataset, the icon of the dataset in the report becomes invalid.
EB: Bug 124620: The icon of the referenced parameter should become invalid when the source parameter in the library is deleted. Description: The icon of the referenced parameter should become invalid when the source parameter in the library is deleted.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a library which includes a parameter. 
2. Delete the parameter from the library. 
3. Reopen the report design file. 
Expected Result: The icon of the referenced parameter should be invalid.
